item.description:
A great time to be had at the Cafe! Cafe Atlantique in Milford that is!!!

"Come and join Kayte Devlin in Celebration this Friday Night March 29th Cafe Atlantique 6:30 to 9:30 pm ...with Kevin Spooner on upright Bass and some special Songwriting friends joining in! My Trilogy of Songs are still sitting at #1 and #1 on The Top Ten song charts Easy Listening , Folk , Pop and" Home" the last song in the Trilogy is at #2 on the Country Charts through sales on Cdbaby iTunes and Amazon... Thank you Thank you Thank you my friends! Can't wait to see you!"

http://cafeatlantiquedtm.com/index.php

I will be there (Gail (203)824-9869) and looking forward to happy hour with great music

Happy Hour is from 5-7 and B1G1 for 33Cents on house wine and a slight discount on some beer

Â
item.how_to_find_us: It is a very small place text me (number is below) and I will raise my hand.....
item.name: I know it's last minute BUT enjoy Friday night music w Kayte Devlin & Friends.
